member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.FunctionMetadata
member.summary: Represents metadata for a function in the NRSRx framework.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.FunctionMetadata.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the function.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.FunctionMetadata.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the function.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.FunctionMetadata.SequencePriority
member.summary: Gets or sets the sequence priority of the function.

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IFunction
member.summary: Represents a function that can be executed within the NRSRx framework.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IFunction.SequencePriority
member.summary: Gets the sequence priority of the function. Higher priority functions are run first (ordered by descending).

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IFunction.RunAsync
member.summary: Executes the function asynchronously.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean indicating whether the function was successful.

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IJob
member.summary: Represents a job within the NRSRx framework.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IJob.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the application configuration.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IJob.JobHost
member.summary: Gets or sets the job host.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IJob.SetupDependencies(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Sets up the dependencies required by the job.
member.param: The service collection to add the dependencies to.
member.returns: The service collection with the dependencies added.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IJob.SetupFunctions(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Sets up the functions to be executed by the job.
member.param: The service collection to add the functions to.
member.returns: The service collection with the functions added.

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.IMessageFunction
member.summary: Represents a message function that can be executed within the NRSRx framework.

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1
member.summary: Base class for defining a job in the NRSRx framework.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.RunContinously
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the job should run continuously.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.EnableParallelFunctionProcessing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether parallel function processing is enabled.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.SecsBetweenRuns
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds between runs.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.SleepTimeSpan
member.summary: Gets the sleep time span based on the number of seconds between runs.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.JobHost
member.summary: Gets or sets the job host.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.HealthFileLocation
member.summary: Gets the location of the health file.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.GetConfig
member.summary: Gets the configuration for the job.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.RunAsync
member.summary: Runs the job asynchronously.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean indicating success.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.RunFunctions(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Runs the functions associated with the job.
member.param: The logger factory to create loggers.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean indicating whether the functions were successful.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Core.JobBase`1.GetFunctions(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Gets the functions to run.
member.returns: An ordered enumerable of function metadata.

member.summary: Scopes and runs a function asynchronously.
